|                                              |                                                                               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              |                                                                                          |
|                                              |                                                                               | -   For each land cover type (class, not meta class), at least 30 pixels (in total)                                                                                                                                                                          |                                                                                          |
|                                              |                                                                               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              |                                                                                          |
|                                              |                                                                               | **Pros and cons of grouping in the same meta class/ separate?**                                                                                                                                                                                              |                                                                                          |
|                                              |                                                                               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              |                                                                                          |
|                                              |                                                                               | -   Can group classes under one meta class                                                                                                                                                                                                                   |                                                                                          |
|                                              |                                                                               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              |                                                                                          |
|                                              |                                                                               | **Any recommendations for other classification tools to use?**                                                                                                                                                                                               |                                                                                          |
|                                              |                                                                               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              |                                                                                          |
|                                              |                                                                               | -   Those shared in class should be good enough                                                                                                                                                                                                              |                                                                                          |
|                                              |                                                                               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              |                                                                                          |
|                                              |                                                                               | -   Usually GIS community uses statistical methods but are moving towards ML techniques                                                                                                                                                                      |                                                                                          |
|                                              |                                                                               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              |                                                                                          |
|                                              |                                                                               | -   Usually use maximum likelihood under statistical methods                                                                                                                                                                                                 |                                                                                          |
|                                              |                                                                               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              |                                                                                          |
|                                              |                                                                               | -   SCP only provides random forest in terms of ML techniques                                                                                                                                                                                                |                                                                                          |
|                                              |                                                                               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              |                                                                                          |
|                                              |                                                                               | -   Can search for remote sensing under plugins and we will see a list                                                                                                                                                                                       |                                                                                          |
|                                              |                                                                               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              |                                                                                          |
|                                              |                                                                               | -   Can explore Orfeo                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        |                                                                                          |
|                                              |                                                                               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              |                                                                                          |
|                                              |                                                                               | **On choosing the training data/ testing data - which layer (TCC/ FCC) to use?**                                                                                                                                                                             |                                                                                          |
|                                              |                                                                               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              |                                                                                          |
|                                              |                                                                               | -   Training data should be different before and after                                                                                                                                                                                                       |                                                                                          |
|                                              |                                                                               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              |                                                                                          |
|                                              |                                                                               | -   Different samples from same location but categorised to different land use types                                                                                                                                                                         |                                                                                          |
|                                              |                                                                               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              |                                                                                          |
|                                              |                                                                               | -   For after flood: severely damaged, moderately damaged, not damaged                                                                                                                                                                                       |                                                                                          |
|                                              |                                                                               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              |                                                                                          |
|                                              |                                                                               |     -   Use humanitarian data source (ground truth) to find                                                                                                                                                                                                  |                                                                                          |
|                                              |                                                                               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              |                                                                                          |
|                                              |                                                                               | **How to determine the extent of the flood**                                                                                                                                                                                                                 |                                                                                          |
|                                              |                                                                               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              |                                                                                          |
|                                              |                                                                               | -   Depends on the classification map                                                                                                                                                                                                                        |                                                                                          |
|                                              |                                                                               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              |                                                                                          |
|                                              |                                                                               | **Purpose of PCA**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           |                                                                                          |
|                                              |                                                                               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              |                                                                                          |
|                                              |                                                                               | -   A form of transformation such that the data is not correlated                                                                                                                                                                                            |                                                                                          |
|                                              |                                                                               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              |                                                                                          |
|                                              |                                                                               | -   Used to deal with highly correlated data (e.g. infrared and red light when there is high vegetation)                                                                                                                                                     |                                                                                          |
|                                              |                                                                               |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              |                                                                                          |
|                                              |                                                                               | -   Maximum likelihood method isn't suitable when dealing with highly correlated data                                                                                                                                                                        |                                                                                          |
